summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Website Competitor Analyzer after claimed fixes. Backend APIs remain 93.8% functional, but critical JWT token expiration issue persists despite main agent's claim of extending token to 7 days. Frontend authentication flow is broken.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Request timeout when fetching analyses list (30+ seconds)
flaky_endpoints.impact: Users cannot view their analysis history reliably

performance_issues.issue: Analysis processing takes 30-60 seconds but completes successfully
performance_issues.impact: Users wait for results but system works

integration_issues.issue: CRITICAL: JWT token still expires during user session, redirecting to login page. Main agent claimed to extend token to 7 days but fix is not working
Users get redirected to login when trying to submit analysis form due to token expiration
Token expires when navigating from dashboard to analysis page

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix JWT token expiration issue. Despite claiming to extend JWT token to 7 days, users are still being redirected to login during normal app usage. The token appears to expire within minutes, not days. Check JWT_SECRET configuration, token generation logic in auth.py, and ensure the expiration time is actually being set to 7 days.
